name: Will You Be My Servant?
text: [Main] If your Leader is [Nami], look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a cost of 2 to 8 and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: If your Leader is [Nami], look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a cost of 2 to 8 and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
